responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "64E904CE42227AC92BD6188E57C73D8A", "It\'s a deadly disease that has infected much of the livestock and the occassional wolves. It turns flesh to into rotting hides and carries it with it a stench of death. We believe it is associated with the odd mists at the nearby ruins. Seek out the origin and destroy it. We\'re losing too many animals.")
name: MADD_0005A_TIG_NPC_OrrikBlackwood_Phase01_28
